column3: This new logic seems "out there" to the reader. You may want to document the reasoning for this check.\n

So when such a softfork is merged in, what is its state (according to BIP9)?\nShould we merge in the source code and keep consensus.vDeployments filled in in such cases? Isn't it better to comment it out instead? Or change BIP9 to reflect this new not-yet-DEFINED state?\n

I think we should just hide deployments whose end time is 0. For all
intents and purposes, the software behaves as if the deployment didn't
exist at all.
